name: upbit
description: upbit 시세 조회 및 알림 봇

scripts.port: sudo iptables -t nat -I PREROUTING -p tcp --dport 80 -j REDIRECT --to-port 8080
scripts.start: yarn port && cd client && yarn && rm -rf build && yarn build serve -s && cd ../server && yarn && npx tsc && pm2 start dist/index.js
scripts.start:server: yarn port && cd server && yarn && npx tsc && pm2 start dist/index.js

author: JunBeum-Cho
